bills.title: Plastic Ban Act
bills.summary: A bill to prohibit the use of single-use plastic bags in retail and grocery stores across the country.

bills.title: Youth Employment Bill
bills.summary: A bill proposing tax incentives for companies that hire fresh graduates and youth under 30.

bills.title: Affordable Housing Act
bills.summary: A bill seeking to allocate 5% of the national budget to build affordable housing units in urban areas.

bills.title: Public Transport Improvement Bill
bills.summary: A bill that mandates the modernization of public transport, including bus fleets and digital fare systems.

comments.author: Grace Muthoni
comments.comment: Consider adding a grace period before the plastic ban takes effect to allow businesses to adjust.

comments.author: Kevin Otieno
comments.comment: The bill should also include provisions for vocational training to enhance youth employability.

comments.author: Linda Njoroge
comments.comment: Please clarify how the 5% housing budget will be distributed across counties to ensure equity.
